LanguageData.PhantomWeave.label: phantom weave
LanguageData.PhantomWeave.description: Plates of Phantom Alloy fused with Hyperweave. Rare and expensive, this fabric is capable of shrugging off both lead and fire alike. It's molecular structure allows even the thinnest of clothing to stop high-caliber rounds. Due to it's high cost, clothing made from this material are usually reserved to glitterworld politicians of high status and specialized units.
